name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Bruce SMITH, Appellant

judges: Before CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Bruce SMITH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Charles R. Witaconis, Scranton, for Bruce Smith.
Andrew John Jarbola, Lisa Ann Gillick, Scranton, for commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
813 A.2d 642
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Bruce SMITH, Appellant.
No. 40 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 2002.
Decided Dec. 31, 2002.
Charles R. Witaconis, Scranton, for Bruce Smith.
Andrew John Jarbola, Lisa Ann Gillick, Scranton, for commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Before CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
